column.name: band
column.description: WISE band number (1-4)

column.name: naxis
column.description: number of data axes

column.name: naxis1
column.description: number of pixels in x (data axis 1)

column.name: naxis2
column.description: number of pixels in y (data axis 2)

column.name: wrelease
column.description: release version of WSDS pipeline

column.name: crpix1
column.description: reference pixel value for axis 1 (x)

column.name: crpix2
column.description: reference pixel value for axis 2 (y)

column.name: crval1
column.description: reference position RA (FK5 J2000) at crpix1,crpix2

column.name: crval2
column.description: reference position Dec (FK5 J2000) at crpix1,crpix2

column.name: ctype1
column.description: projection type (with distortion) for axis 1 (x)

column.name: ctype2
column.description: projection type (with distortion) for axis 2 (y)

column.name: equinox
column.description: equinox of WCS information

column.name: bunit
column.description: image data unit

column.name: elon
column.description: ecliptic longitude of crpix1,crpix2

column.name: elat
column.description: ecliptic latitude of crpix1,crpix2

column.name: glon
column.description: galactic longitude of crpix1,crpix2

column.name: glat
column.description: galactic latitude of crval1,crval2

column.name: ra1
column.description: RA (FK5 J2000) of corner #1 (crpix1,crpix2=-.5,-.5)

column.name: dec1
column.description: Dec (FK5 J2000) of corner #1 (crpix1,crpix2=-.5,-.5)

column.name: ra2
column.description: RA (FK5 J2000) of corner #2 (crpix1,crpix2=naxis1+.5,-.5)

column.name: dec2
column.description: Dec (FK5 J2000) of corner #2 (crpix1,crpix2=naxis1+.5,-.5)

column.name: ra3
column.description: RA (FK5 J2000) of corner #3 (crpix1,crpix2=naxis1+.5,naxis2+.5)

column.name: dec3
column.description: Dec (FK5 J2000) of corner #3 (crpix1,crpix2=naxis1+.5,naxis2+.5)

column.name: ra4
column.description: RA (FK5 J2000) of corner #4 (crpix1,crpix2=-.5,naxis2+.5)

column.name: dec4
column.description: Dec (FK5 J2000) of corner #4 (crpix1,crpix2=-.5,naxis2+.5)

column.name: magzp
column.description: relative photometric zero-point mag

column.name: magzpunc
column.description: 1-sigma uncertainty in photometric zero-point mag

column.name: coadd_id
column.description: coadd ID

column.name: fcdate
column.description: date and time of file creation, UTC

column.name: date_obs1
column.description: date and time of observation of earliest frame in coadd, UTC

column.name: mid_obs
column.description: date and time of observation of middle frame in coadd, UTC

column.name: date_obs2
column.description: date and time of observation of latest frame in coadd, UTC

column.name: sizex
column.description: linear dimension of coadd along axis 1 (x)

column.name: sizey
column.description: linear dimension of coadd along axis 2 (y)

column.name: pxscal1
column.description: arcsec/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 1 (x)

column.name: pxscal2
column.description: arcsec/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 2 (y)

column.name: moonrej
column.description: number of frames rejected due to moon-glow

column.name: mooninp
column.description: initial number of input frames with suspected moon-glow

column.name: medint
column.description: median of intensity pixels

column.name: medcov
column.description: median depth of coverage in coadd

column.name: mincov
column.description: minimum depth of coverage in coadd

column.name: maxcov
column.description: maximum depth of coverage in coadd

column.name: lowcovpc1
column.description: percent area of coadd footprint with coverage depth <= 4 pixels

column.name: lowcovpc2
column.description: percent area of coadd footprint with coverage depth <= 6 pixels

column.name: nomcovpc
column.description: percent area of coadd footprint with coverage depth <= 8 pixels

column.name: mincovpc
column.description: percent area of coadd footprint with coverage depth TBD pixels

column.name: robsig
column.description: robust spatial sigma at medcov +/- 0.25

column.name: pixchis1
column.description: ratio of robust spatial sigma / median uncertainty at medcov +/- 0.25

column.name: pixchis2
column.description: ratio of robust spatial sigma / modal uncertainty at medcov +/- 0.25

column.name: mednmsk
column.description: median number of pixels masked per frame

column.name: cdelt1
column.description: deg/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 1 (x)

column.name: cdelt2
column.description: deg/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 2 (y)

column.name: crota2
column.description: image twist angle of +axis2 W of N

column.name: bitmask
column.description: fatal bitstring mask template

column.name: numfrms
column.description: number of image frames used to create coadd

column.name: qa_status
column.description: QA status for scan: Prelim, Reviewed, or Final

column.name: qual_coadd
column.description: quality score value for coadd

column.name: qc_fact
column.description: quality factor qc value for coadd: completion quality

column.name: qi_fact
column.description: quality factor qi value for coadd: image quality

column.name: qa_fact
column.description: quality factor qa value for coadd: astrometry quality

column.name: q1_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q2_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q3_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q4_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: q5_fact
column.description: quality factor TBD value for scan: TBD

column.name: date_imgprep
column.description: date image prepared

column.name: load_id
column.description: unique load ID number

column.name: cntr
column.description: unique record ID

column.name: x
column.description: unit sphere position x = cos(crval1)*cos(crval2)

column.name: y
column.description: unit sphere position y = sin(crval1)*cos(crval2)

column.name: z
column.description: unit sphere position z = sin(crval2)

column.name: spt_ind
column.description: Level 7 HTM index of (crval1, crval2), decimal encoding
